description:
Shima Daisuke is the Officer in charge of the navigational section on the Yamato. Chief Navigator in charge of navigation, signaling, watch, comprehensive route planning. He is also the helmsman in charge of steering the Yamato. His rank is Air captain first-class, born in Okinawa Prefecture.
He was an Air Captain third-class in the 101st regular space division before boarding Yamato, received a two-class promotion to chief navigator when the previous candidate was killed in action in a battle against Gamilas.
name: Shima Daisuke
